metadata.title: CVE-2022-48779 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: mscc: ocelot: fix use-after-free in ocelot_vlan_del()ocelot_vlan_member_del() will free the struct ocelot_bridge_vlan, so ifthis is the same as the port's pvid_vlan which we access afterwards,what we're accessing is freed memory.Fix the bug by determining whether to clear ocelot_port->pvid_vlan priorto calling ocelot_vlan_member_del().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48779` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-1027-fips - 4.15.0-1027.32
linux-image-hmac-4.15.0-1027-fips - 4.15.0-1027.32
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1027-fips - 4.15.0-1027.32
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-1027-fips - 4.15.0-1027.32
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2000-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2000.4
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2000-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2000.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1002-azure-fips - 4.15.0-1002.2
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-1002-azure-fips - 4.15.0-1002.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2013-gcp-fips - 4.15.0-2013.14
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2013-gcp-fips - 4.15.0-2013.14
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
